channel.title: How do you make your own server (not rs private server)
channel.description: i just want to know i have a spare pc hanging around that works well (Win.xp) and i just want to know if i put it back to like if it came out of the box how to make it into a server that can host my website instead of paying per month for web hosting i will host it on my own pc any one know? i think you need server softwere but i dont have a clue

item.title: How do you make your own server (not rs private server)
item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

Aftermath_96:

I’d use apache / the xampp pack.

I agree.
Make sure you open the right port, and then just give the other person your IP address and they can view the open directory.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make your own server (not rs private server)
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

Install a sort of linux (less likely to get hacked) and then install apache, MySql and php. Which are all free and your set for hosting. Oh and remember. You musts leave your computer on 24/7.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you make your own server (not rs private server)
item.dc:creator: @Flamed_Fury11 Flamed_Fury1
item.description:
@Flamed_Fury11 wrote:

rob1601:

No you need to by a server, you cannot use it. You can host a privare server but not a website server. you still have to pay unless you have an actual server

Actually xampp/apache just runs an http server off your computer -.-
So you can host your web-server while playing games etc.

http://www.apachefriends.org/en/xampp.html

Read full topic
